dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright  & Trademark Infringement,  & Terrorist Organisations & Breeches of
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 8:35 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright & Trademark Infringement, & Terrorist
Organisations & Breeches of Terms and Conditions

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Wednesday, February 15,
2006 at
7:48:13 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Copyright  & Trademark Infringement, & Terrorist Organisations &
Breeches of Terms and Conditions

MESSAGE BODY:
Hello

I am the Head of Brand Protection for The Rangers Football Club plc with a
number of duties and responsibilities connected with protecting the Clubs
Intellectual Property and 'image'.

It has recently been brought to our attention that the website below
contains our copyright material and promotes and or displays content paying
tribute to banned terrorist organisations which I assume is against your
terms and conditions.  The site is of great concern to ourselves as it is
damaging our good name and reputation and causing great distress to the Club

http://proddygirl.co.uk

The site is registered to Edward Carson but his contact details have been
blocked.  However in any event I doubt that he would answer our emails.  I
have attached a notice of infringement and would be obliged if you could
disable this site immediately and provide us with landline addresses etc
where we can issue legal papers against the person running this site.



I am aware that some emails don't accept attachments for security reasons
and if this is the case I can fax this to you if you require.  I would
appreciate if this  could be dealt with as a matter of urgency.

Regards

Alistair Campbell
Head of Brand Protection
The Rangers Football Club plc

Tel :  + 00 44 (0)141 580 8533
Fax : + 00 44 (0)141 580 8697
email : acampbel@rangers.co.uk

IMPORTANT NOTICE
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The information in this email, and any attachments, is confidential and may
be legally privileged.  It is intended for the named addressee only. 
If you are not a named addressee you must not, use, copy or disclose the
information contained in it.  Please contact me immediately and delete the
email from your system before destroying any hard copies which may have been
made.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1F9Mzp-0000FN-Ll; Wed, 15 Feb 2006 07:47:08 -0600
Received: from mx02 ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from AlistairCampbell@rangers.co.uk)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1F9MzV-0000EK-3f
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 15 Feb 2006 07:46:46 -0600
Received: from mail.rangers.co.uk ([62.254.177.131]
        helo=ironport.rangers.co.uk)
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
        AlistairCampbell@rangers.co.uk) with esmtp (Exim) id
1F9MyE-0007xe-Fp
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 15 Feb 2006 07:46:44 -0600
Received: from unknown (HELO CSM01999) ([128.6.0.1])
        by ironport.rangers.co.uk with ESMTP; 15 Feb 2006 13:44:49 +0000
X-IronPort-AV: i="4.02,117,1139184000"; 
        d="doc'32?scan'32,208,32"; a="405226:sNHT1062273836"
To: abuse@theplanet.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
X-Mailer: Lotus Notes Release 5.0.11   July 24, 2002
Message-ID:
<OF3AE1899D.7B754785-ON80257116.004BCB9D-80257116.004BD360@LocalDomain>

        2002) at 15/02/2006 13:48:13

        permitted nor denied by domain of rangers.co.uk)
        client-ip=62.254.177.131;
        envelope-from=AlistairCampbell@rangers.co.uk;

Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright  & Trademark Infringement,  & Terrorist

---Attached Document---

Notification of Infringement


BY Email : 

Dear Sir/Madam

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorised to act on behalf of The Rangers Football Club plc on all matters relating to the authorised or unauthorised use of their intellectual property.  I have a good faith belief that the use of the material identified below has not been authorised by the owner, its agents or the law.  Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to it.

Name of the I P Owner 		            The Rangers Football Club plc

Description of Infringed Right     	Registered Trademarks and Copyright  in Rangers Crests

                    

Location of Infringing Material  		www.proddygirl.co.uk 

Under
